nodes.text: Fellwater was a laboratory that was destroyed in the bombardment of the planet Taris in 3956 BBY. Centuries later, the acidic Lake Brell sat over the ruins of Fellwater Labs. Around 3642 BBY, the reconstituted Sith Empire completely invaded Taris and had the Toxic Lake Garrison nearby. They had infantry patrolling near Fellwater, meaning this could be tied with the disappearance of the Lake Brell colony.
